coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A discreet tag on the waistband of the pants informs you that it was made by 'Miome'.
coreAttributes.name: zhongku
coreAttributes.description: A piece of hanfu translating as "middle pants", it is designed to be worn over the underwear and under outerwear. It is also worn as sleepwear.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the zhongku, before pulling them up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the zhongku, before pulling them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the zhongku, before yanking them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] zhongku, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] zhongku, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] zhongku, before yanking them off.
